name: MY FIRST GAME - THE GAME
description:
I made this when I was 14 back in 2013. I hate game development.

You're a flaming dude who needs to get to his home. You have to follow the signs to get to the end of the game, which is beatable. I put some killer particle effects in it tho.

Music - Muse : Map of the Problematique

I know it's copyrighted, yeah.
